ProjectTitle: Understanding and tackling T cell dysfunctions towards improving colorectal cancer therapies.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 06/07/2022 [REDACTED] to your data and ethics sections you work with animal models, but under sharing you describe sharing pseudonymous data in EGA which is only relevant for human data. [REDACTED] arrayexpress be more suitable? [REDACTED] www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/ to find the most suitable EMBL-EBI repository. [REDACTED] the submission guidelines of candidate repositories may also help you to design your own metadata standard. [REDACTED] good to have a look at the arrive guidelines for reporting of animal experiments already: https://arriveguidelines.org/ many journals now ask to follow these.
label: good with suggestions
